objective_details.objective: Achieve net-positive environmental impact across the value chain by 2030
Net Zero Carbon by 2030 (operations) and Net Zero value chain by 2050 (SBTi-validated)
Net Zero across all sites by 2030
Priority: organic cotton, recycled polyester, Tencel
Lead through digital-first innovation, becoming the most technologically advanced manufacturer
IoT sensors and connected machines (80% by 2029)
AI quality control and computer vision
Most inclusive and empowered workforce with transformative community impact
IDEA (Inclusivity, Diversity, Equity to Accelerate) Strategy
World-class quality, efficiency, and customer satisfaction
Zero complaints and Six Sigma quality
Exemplary governance and proactive risk management
